title: Emergency Response Activation
summary: As an older adult, I want to quickly initiate emergency alerts using a simple voice command so that I can receive prompt assistance in crisis situations.

title: Medication Management
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want to set and receive medication reminders through voice commands so that I can manage my health efficiently and maintain my independence.

title: Intuitive User Interface Design
summary: As an older adult, I want an easy-to-navigate interface so that I can use ALFRED independently without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Personalized Interaction History
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want to easily access my interaction history so that I can review previous commands and responses without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Social Engagement Tracking
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to track my participation in social activities so that I can receive feedback and motivation to stay engaged with my friends and community.

title: Assisted Setup for Non-Tech Savvy Users
summary: As an older adult, I want a guided setup process so that I can easily install and configure ALFRED without needing external help.

title: Flexible Activity Scheduling
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want to customize my schedules for physical and cognitive activities using voice commands so that I can maintain my independence and manage my daily routines effectively.
